Issue.creator: jyellick
Issue.summary: Remove sentinel on channelconfig ApplicationConfig and OrdererConfig
Issue.description: The API for channelconfig to retrieve the application and orderer config returns a sentinel indicating whether the config is present or not. However, any time these calls are being made, they are done so in a context where the config has already been validated to contain the correct components, so the result is almost always a panic if the sentinel returns false. The API should simply be updated to remove the sentinel and assume that it is always populated.
